en.description: Assisted the NCCU Freshman Orientation team in managing their image website (which has since been revamped). My main responsibilities included front-end layout, as well as uploading text and images.

en.description: Assisted in creating a dedicated website for the NCCU Arabic Alumni Association from scratch using WordPress. The site allows members to register and pay annual fees, as well as review annual activities.

en.title: Research Assistant at the AI Center of NCCU
en.description: Served as a Research Assistant at the AI Center of NCCU, participating in an industry-academia collaboration project using PHP, MySQL, and Apache. Assisted the company in developing the Home Care Website and maintained its functionality.
